flawed_nl_solution:
She has mowed 900 square feet because 3 x 20 x 15 = <<3*20*15=900>>900
She has earned $90 because 900 x 0.1 = <<900*0.1=90>>90
She has to earn $63 more dollars because 150 - 90 = <<150-90=63>>63
She has to mow 630 more square feet of lawns because 63 / 0.1 = <<63/0.1=630>>630
#### 630

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 63. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
